db:info.db:title: TriggerBody QML Type
db:info.db:edition: Qt Quick 3D Physics | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Reports when objects enter a given volume.
This type was introduced in Qt 6.4.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type defines a trigger body. A trigger body is a body that does not interact physically but is used to detect when objects intersect with its volume.

db:section.db:title: collisionCount : int
db:section.db:para: This property returns the number of bodies currently colliding with the trigger body.

db:section.db:title: bodyEntered(PhysicsNode *body)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the trigger body is penetrated by the specified body.

db:section.db:title: bodyExited(PhysicsNode *body)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the trigger body is no longer penetrated by the specified body.
